name: The Unbelievable Adventures of Kamil the Cat
name_original: The Unbelievable Adventures of Kamil the Cat
description:
The Unbelievable Adventures of Kamil the Cat is a short story about a cat and his unbelievable adventures. I can only say that these adventures include things like eating sandwiches, so you can guess it's pretty awesome.

We wanted the game to be a lot longer but we didn't have enough time :I

Anyways, have fun!

(also check out our website for updates on the upcoming Kamil the Cat game!)
